body: this is new, TLDRA business analyst who has led multiple development teams shares their experience of building a 2D game called 'Scorpions and Ferraris' in 40 minutes using Golang and the Ebiten library. The game, inspired by Frogger, features a scorpion avoiding cars to reach the other side of the screen. The post includes detailed steps for Show more
